main event: Multiple reports of unidentified flying objects (UFOs) observed over Kelly AFB, Texas.
interesting points: Spherical lights were observed exhibiting slow erratic motion at an altitude of 1,500 to 2,000 feet,No witnesses were able to describe the objects clearly,Some witnesses noted that the objects appeared to change direction and were observed for approximately 1 minute and 50 seconds,The objects were reported by both civilian and military personnel,The sighting from 14 August 1952 involved multiple witnesses observing a round object that executed a climbing turn before disappearing behind a cloud.
sighted object: round unidentified objects or spherical lights
witness description: civilian and military personnel at the Compass Rose location
